void MGUnit_vector::orthonormal ( const MGVector &  sv,
MGUnit_vector &  v1,
MGUnit_vector &  v2 
) const

Compute orthonormal system, given sub(sv) vectors.

(*this, v1, v2) organizes orthonormal system of 3D. If sv.orthogonal(*this), v1=sv.normalize().
